channel.title: Pinchy Claw?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Pinchy Claw?" - How exactly do I get the Pinchy Claw?

item.title: Re: Pinchy Claw?
item.content:encoded: well first of all you have to be kage, second on the party house page under claw machines it lets you set the price for each difficulty.

item.title: Pinchy Claw?
item.content:encoded: How am I supposed to set the ryo cost to 5001 or above when I'm trying to get the pinchy claw? I know that there has to be some way, but it isn't available to me.
